title: What are Personality development courses for kids? - Quora

response.answer_text: The idea of personality development course is to open the mind of children, from a young age to help them understand their strength and weakness and help them create a right attitude to face challenges in life. This will give them confidence to achieve their goals in life. Personality development course for children can be short term or long term. These courses will help children learn techniques in fun and innovative method. To manage time better, to enhance their listening skills and learn some negotiation skills. Topics covered by the course are: ConfidencePositive attitudeDressing SenseBody LanguageListening SkillsManners and EtiquettesTime ManagementDecision MakingConflict ManagementGoal SettingsNegotiation SkillsSelf-MotivationSWOT AnalysisTeam WorkWin-Win Situation

The personality development for kids? The home where their parents live. There isnt any other best teacher for a kid rather than their parents. The kids tend to observe and copy the behaviour, style, talk etc… from the parents.        A child can learn the best personality if their parents… Thank you for A2A    :) Let them replicate your personality…
